name: English
details: English is a West Germanic language of the Indo-European language family, with its earliest forms spoken by the inhabitants of early medieval England.

name: Math
details: Mathematics is an area of knowledge that includes such topics as numbers (arithmetic and number theory), formulas and related structures (algebra)

name: physics
details: Physics is the natural science that studies matter, its fundamental constituents, its motion and behavior through space and time, and the related entities of energy and force.

name: Chemistry
details: Chemistry is the scientific study of the properties and behavior of matter.[1] It is a natural science that covers the elements that make up matter to the compounds composed of atoms.

name: ICT
details: ICT is a broad subject and the concepts are evolving. It covers any product that will store, retrieve, manipulate, transmit, or receive information

name: Biology
details: Biology is the scientific study of life. ... It is a natural science with a broad scope but has several unifying themes that tie it together as a single, coherent
